  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int numOfPlayers)
      Constructor - creates a new instance of a game
      Parameters:
      numOfPlayers - - first player to connect and consequently create the game sets the number of players for such game

    • Game

      public Game(String savedProgressFilePath)
      This constructor is used to load the game progress from a json file
      Parameters:
      savedProgressFilePath - the file path of the json file where the game progress has been saved

    • Game

      public Game(int numOfPlayers, Board board, ArrayList<Player> playerList)
      Used for testing: calls gameStartSetup methods withing the constructor for ease of testing.

  • Method Details

    • gameStartSetup

      public void gameStartSetup() throws Exception
      Throws:
      Exception

    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer(String nick)
      If playersList isn't full, adds a new player to the leaderBoard and to playersList - fristPlayerSeat set to false by default. When all players have joined, starts the game.
      Parameters:
      nick - - nickname

    • drawsFromBoard

      public List<Tile> drawsFromBoard(int x, int y, int amount, Board.Direction direction, String playerNickname) throws InvalidMoveException
      This method is used to draw tiles from board
      Parameters:
      x - : represents the row of the first tile you want to draw from
      y - : represents the column of the first tile you want to draw from
      amount - : the number of tiles you want to draw
      direction - : starting from the first tiles position just specified, the direction to follow to pick the remaining ones
      playerNickname - : player that is performing the drawing
      Returns:
      : list ot tiles drawn from Board if the tiles can be drawn, null otherwise
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException

    • insertTilesInShelf

      public boolean insertTilesInShelf(List<Tile> drawnTiles, int column, Player player) throws InvalidMoveException
      This method is used to insert the tiles you just have drawn into player's shelf
      Parameters:
      drawnTiles - : the list of tiles resulting from drawsFromBoard
      column - : the column in player's shelf you want to insert drawn tiles
      player - : the player who's playing the turn, performing insertion
      Returns:
      true if insertion is correctly executed, false otherwise
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException

    • endOfTurn

      public void endOfTurn(Player player)
      This method is used to handle player's end turn
      Parameters:
      player - : the player that is playing and is about to end his turn

    • playTurn

      public void playTurn(int x, int y, int amount, Board.Direction direction, int column, List<Tile> reorderedTiles) throws InvalidMoveException
      This method makes the player draw from the board and inserts tile in the shelf, then changes the isPlaying Player parameters to call drawTiles and insertTiles methods in class Player
      Parameters:
      x - rows of game board [0 ... 9]
      y - columns of game board [0 ... 9]
      amount - amount of tiles to be drawn [0 ... 3]
      direction - draw direction [RIGHT, LEFT, UP, DOWN]
      column - shelf column to place drawn tiles [0 ... 5]
      Throws:
      InvalidMoveException

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer(String nick)
      Removes player with nickname nick from playersList and leaderBoard when client disconnects before game has started. Should only be called if game hasn't started.

    • distanceFromFirstPlayer

      private int distanceFromFirstPlayer(Player player)
      this method is used to get the distance of a player from the player who holds the first player seat
      Parameters:
      player - : player you want to check the distance from first player
      Returns:
      the distance of the player from the first player

    • setFirstPlayer

      private void setFirstPlayer()
      Picks random player to start the game. Sets the iterator to point to such player in the list. Sets isPlaying to the selected player.

    • chooseCommonGoals

      public void chooseCommonGoals()
      Chooses two random and distinct common goal cards and adds them to the commonGoalCards list

    • setBoard

      private void setBoard()
      Creates new board as a function of the number of players - also gives players a reference to the Board instance variable

    • checkArrayForDuplicate

      private boolean checkArrayForDuplicate(int[] numberAlreadyDrawn, int randomNum)
      Used by drawPersonalGoalCard to check if a number has already been drawn
      Parameters:
      numberAlreadyDrawn - vector of already drawn numbers
      randomNum - random generated number
      Returns:
      true if randomNum equals to another number in vector numberAlreadyDrawn, false otherwise

    • hasTheGameEnded

      public boolean hasTheGameEnded()
      This method is used to check if the game has ended
      Returns:
      true if the game is over, false otherwise

      private void drawPersonalGoalCard()

    • fillValidTileMap

      public void fillValidTileMap()

    • saveGameProgress

      public void saveGameProgress(String filePath)
      This method saves games progress in a file to guarantee persistence funcionality
      Parameters:
      filePath - : the filePath that points to the file in which to save game progresses.

    • loadGameProgress

      public boolean loadGameProgress(String filePath)
      This method is used to guarantee the persistence functionality and is invoked to loadGameProgress from the file in which it was previously saved from method saveGameProgress
      Parameters:
      filePath - : filPath of the file you want to load game progress from
      Returns:
      false if the file does not exist, true if the progresses are correctly loaded
